data.title: Paranormal Investigation: YOU are the Ghost Hunter
meta_keywords: fun things to do in charleston
data.meta_description: Collect paranormal evidence using our tools in a small group setting of up to twelve ghost hunters total.This is not your average ghost storytelling tour, this is an interactive experience to learn the history of Charleston by being part of the story. You'll collect paranormal evidence, hear histories of Charleston and then receive all recorded data from all ghost hunters in your investigation. This includes videos, audio, along with any visuals and screenshots used to verify paranormal captures. An Estes Method will also be performed during your investigation, a very interesting and new method of ghost hunting. When booking, please provide a texting phone number. All guests receive a text with meeting point and parking instructions on the morning of their investigation.This also allows guests to receive all the recorded data/evidence from their investigation (provided the following day).
data.text:
I booked this ghost hunt for a mother/daughter weekend! My daughter LOVES ghosts shows and stories. I was looking for something different from the common walking ghost tours. After reading through the reviews and the fact that you get to use actual equipment, Stories In The Cemetery was the one t...

I booked this ghost hunt for a mother/daughter weekend! My daughter LOVES ghosts shows and stories. I was looking for something different from the common walking ghost tours. After reading through the reviews and the fact that you get to use actual equipment, Stories In The Cemetery was the one to go with. Nick is very well versed in historical information! One person in our group actually brought her own equipment and Nick was excited with sharing quick suggestions and differences compared to his equipment. He is also up front with what to expect. Some nights are more active than others! Our tour was not a very active night but we did catch a couple orbs and many terms/phrases were caught on the spirit box corresponding to locations that we were exploring. I would definitely suggest booking a ghost hunt with Nick and plan on booking with him again the next time we are in town!

Very fun way to spend a night in Charleston! Hands on with real ghost-hunting equipment, and historical facts that enhance the hunt. Nick is very informative and looks out to make sure all the guests have a great time. Highly recommended!

Very fun way to spend a night in Charleston! Hands on with real ghost-hunting equipment, and historical facts that enhance the hunt. Nick is very informative and looks out to make sure all the guests have a great time. Highly recommended!

Nick was amazing, he had great stories. Getting to use the equipment made the experience so much better than just walking around listening to a tour guide. Highly recommend it!

Nick was amazing, he had great stories. Getting to use the equipment made the experience so much better than just walking around listening to a tour guide. Highly recommend it!

Absolutely amazing experience. Nick kept it entertaining and interesting the whole time. Definitely would recommend this to anyone who wants hands on experience with devices. I will most definitely be back.

Absolutely amazing experience. Nick kept it entertaining and interesting the whole time. Definitely would recommend this to anyone who wants hands on experience with devices. I will most definitely be back.

Great experience. Nick is very knowledgeable and engaging. Very interactive. We have been on many ghost tours and this is by far the best one ever.

Great experience. Nick is very knowledgeable and engaging. Very interactive. We have been on many ghost tours and this is by far the best one ever.

Such a fun way to learn more about the city! Even my two grumpy teens were engaged and enjoyed themselves. We were still talking about it the next morning.
